Parameters: String: The message, or null if there is no message
ServiceConfigurationError(java.lang.Stri.Description: Constructs a new instance with the specified message.

Parameters: String: The message, or null if there is no message
Throwable: The cause, or null if the cause is nonexistent or unknown
ServiceConfigurationError(java.lang.Stri.Description: Constructs a new instance with the specified message and cause.

ClassDesc: Error thrown when something goes wrong while loading a service provider. This error will be thrown in the following situations: The format of a provider-configuration file violates the An @B_java#io#IOException_E@ occurs while reading a provider-configuration file; A concrete provider class named in a provider-configuration file cannot be found; A concrete provider class is not a subclass of the service class; A concrete provider class cannot be instantiated; or Some other kind of error occurs.
